Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory107.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Miss Alpha has completed her mission perfectly. Shome is moving just like we expected him to.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "As for me... The hunting grounds are ready. He should have no qualms dying with the funeral we've prepared him with.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'You all know what to do. Yes?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Obliterate Shome.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'His death shall deter his savior.', 4: '1'}
{3: "With that, Roland and Gabriel turn and depart. Luna's brows are still furrowed after they take their leave."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Tell me the results of your recon mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Yes, Miss Luna. That person seems to have sold his "foster son" out...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Back in po-pan when he was still human, he was a man of many titles. "Downtown Tyrant", ""Agent of Death"", "Behemoth"...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "He's involved in all sorts of underground stuff... Even for humans, he's the most despicable sort...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...Your words are making me distrust humans even more.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Ah... Well... That's why we... took on such forms, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'S-so, Miss Luna, how should we deal with him and his proposal?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'We\'ll see. Let\'s get an idea of what he wants from "us" first.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If he wishes to have a go at the "filtering," allow him to.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory148.png'}
{3: 'A few weeks ago...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'An interesting fella came visiting.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'He\'s saying a "strange Ascendant" showed up and is conducting some sort of research.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "But, well, he's likely got deeper ties to that Ascendant than he shows.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "He's got that Ascendant's trails figured. There's convincing evidence too in the files he provided us with.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'But, why would he betray that Ascendant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'And, quite frankly, this Ascendant can only be "her" work. The one that\'s been showing up nearby.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Apparently she's just the same as before, finding people that can be saved.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: '...This is getting troublesome.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If we let her run wild, our work as agents of the Ascension-Network will be hindered.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'So—what do we do?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Give me the files that the "interesting fella" gave you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I'll decide after I have a look.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Very well, Miss Luna.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'From the history of this person, he should not have lived through the "filter."'}
{3: 'But if the files are true, then he must have gained protection by the network through certain means.'}
{3: 'And, he is now using the power from the Ascension-Network to conduct dangerous research.'}
{3: 'If there\'s anyone to "save" this kind of person, "she" is the only possible candidate.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Sigh... You're an agent, and yet you keep causing such troubles...", 4: '1'}
{3: "To assimilate other agents to our side, we'll need a display of power."}
{3: 'And for this, we need a scapegoat—one we know who will never stand on our side.'}
{3: '——Which, as far as we can tell, leaves only "her."'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Though I'd prefer not to provoke other agents before the time is right...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "But you're showing up in our grounds and messing things up... We have no other choice...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "After all, this is an agent's duty.", 4: '1'}
